attributes.action: Make it illegal for an MP to vote on any EU topic without first carrying out a referendum of the people of his constituency.
attributes.additional_details: It is becoming more and more apparent that the VAST majority of our elected representatives are no longer representing the people who voted for them.  This is particularly noticeable on matters involving the EU.  It should be made illegal for an MP to not represent the views of his/her constituency population and to do so they MUST be legally compelled to carry out and comply with the outcome of a referendum - EVERY TIME.

rejection.details: This is party political and not a matter for HMG
